text: Finding Server… Please enter the address of the required SecSign ID Server. The server address Other SecSign ID Server saving SecSign ID… registering SecSign ID… creating keypair… Generating SecSign ID Fingerprint Create SecSign ID ��The SecSign ID is protected by a passcode. The passcode is only used for the encryption of the private key. It will never be transmitted or stored. You may choose a more complex password in edit mode later o Re-Enter Password Enter Password (min. %d characters) Choose Short User Name Create SecSign ID To Registration This is the name which you will enter on the web site later on. label: RestoreActivity
text: saving SecSign ID… registering SecSign ID… creating keypair… Generating SecSign ID Fingerprint Restore SecSign ID ��The SecSign ID is protected by a passcode. The passcode is only used for the encryption of the private key. It will never be transmitted or stored. You may choose a more complex password in edit mode later o Re-Enter Password Enter Passcode (min. %d digits) Finding Server… Please enter the address of the required SecSign ID Server. The server address Other SecSign ID Server E-mail validation code Restore SecSign ID Please check your e-mail at %s and enter the validation code just received. Verifying Mail Restoration Code… Code from e-mail just received Enter restoration code Restore SecSign ID ��The SecSignApp on your original device could show you the restoration code needed here to authorize the restoration of the SecSign I Verifying Restoration Code… Restoration code Enter Short User Name Restore SecSign ID This is the name which you will enter on the web site later on. Verifying User Name… Password e.g. jdoe saving SecSign ID… registering SecSign ID… creating keypair… ��The SecSign ID is protected by a passcode. The passcode is only used for the encryption of the private key. It will never be transmitted or stored. You may choose a more complex password in edit mode later o Re-Enter Password Enter Passcode (min. %d digits) Choose a Passcode Fingerprint Restore SecSign ID Finding Server… Please enter the address of the required SecSign ID Server. The server address Other SecSign ID Server Please check your e-mail at %s and enter the validation code just received. Verifying Mail Restoration Code… Code from e-mail just received Enter Email Code Choose Short User Name Restore a SecSign ID ��The SecSignApp on your original device could show you the restoration code needed here to authorize the restoration of the SecSign I Verifying Restoration Code… Restoration code Enter Restore Code Choose Short User Name Restore a SecSign ID This is the name which you will enter on the web site later on. Verifying User Name… Password e.g. jdoe Input your Short Username Choose Short User Name Restore a SecSign ID
